proj.zoie.api.indexing
接口 IndexReaderDecorator<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>

所有已知实现类：
AbstractIndexReaderDecorator, DefaultIndexReaderDecorator
public interface IndexReaderDecorator<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>

Decorates a ZoieIndexReader to a customized IndexReader.

另请参见：
FilterIndexReader

方法摘要
 R decorate(ZoieIndexReader<R> indexReader)
          Do the decoration
 R redecorate(R decorated, ZoieIndexReader<R> copy, boolean withDeletes)
          This is called when the actual underlying reader was not changed, but a new reference was created.
 void setDeleteSet(R reader, org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSet docIds)
           
 

方法详细信息

decorate

R decorate(ZoieIndexReader<R> indexReader)
                                                       throws IOException
Do the decoration

参数：
indexReader - source reader
返回：
a decorated reader
抛出：
IOException

redecorate

R redecorate(R decorated,
             ZoieIndexReader<R> copy,
             boolean withDeletes)
                                                         throws IOException
This is called when the actual underlying reader was not changed, but a new reference was created. Generally, the decorated reader should be at least shallow copied due to reuse of the decorated reader. If we dont copy the decorated reader and change the inner reader, it would create a race condition and cause data inconsistency.

参数：
decorated - Previously decoreated reader
copy - a new copy of the source reader
withDeletes - indicator for whether this segment contained new deletes
返回：
Re-decorated reader
抛出：
IOException

setDeleteSet

void setDeleteSet(R reader,
                  org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSet docIds)
